tossup_question: 30) CHEMISTRY  Which of the following substances will have the lowest entropy?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) Product of a freezing reaction
X) Water vapor
Y) Product of a vaporization reaction
Z) Liquid water
tossup_answer: ANSWER: W) Product of a freezing reaction
bonus_question: 30) CHEMISTRY  Solvents, such as water, that can both donate and accept protons are typically described as:
bonus_MCQoptions:
W) resonant 
X) metalloid 
Y) amphoteric 
Z) polyprotic
